NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 233 and 929? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Proposal Sent to Negotiation, or from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Needs Analysis} to {Proposal Sent} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Initial Contact to Needs Analysis, or from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Contact} to {Needs Analysis} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Proposal Sent to Negotiation, from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent, or from stage Initial Contact to Needs Analysis?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Contact} to stage {Needs Analysis} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initial Contact} and {Needs Analysis} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Proposal Sent} and {Negotiation} stages.
